resp:

1. First, we compare the attendance values for each season from the "6th misl", "misl ii", league. 2. We note that the attendance for the year "2005 - 2006" is exactly 3170, which matches the given average attendance we are comparing against.

6. We still need to check the remaining seasons mentioned in the claim: "8th misl , 11 - 19", and "1st western , 12 - 4". In our table, there's only one row with the "8th misl" record (which is from the year "2007 - 2008") and two rows with the "1st western" record (from the years "2008 - 2009" and "2009 - 2010").

7. The attendance values for these seasons are respectively: 5095, 2358, and 942. All of them are greater than 3170.

8. Since we have not found a single data point where the attendance is equal to or smaller than 3170 for any of the remaining seasons from the "8th misl", "misl ii", or "1st western" leagues, we can conclude that all the seasons mentioned in the claim do have an average attendance smaller than 3170.
